data.title: Funky Monkey Babys - Kaze
data.meta_description: First a little announcement: I've finally updated the Taiji Project FAQ !! If you've had questions, check it out - they might actually be answered now :D;; Anyway... so a full day of internet downtime earlier this week (grr) left me with a bit of time to work on several offline projects. data.text:
First a little announcement: I've finally updated the Taiji Project FAQ!! If you've had questions, check it out - they might actually be answered now :D;;

Anyway... so a full day of internet downtime earlier this week (grr) left me with a bit of time to work on several offline projects. Which, long story short, led to the completion of another pair of lyric requests! First of those is another Funky Monkey Babys title, Kaze...

Funky Monkey Babys - Kaze (Wind)

Kaze ga chotto dake tsumetaku naru

Konna toki koso ite hoshii no ni

Kimi wa ano hi no kioku no naka

Kanashii hodo egao no mama

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Koushuu Kaidou no ichou namiki ano hodoukyou o tooru tabi ni

Boku wa ima de mo omoidasun da kimi wa ima de mo oboetemasu ka?

Waraigoe ga hibiitari namida de keshiki ga nijindari

Kimi ga zutto soba ni ita kara zutto soba ni iru to omotteita kara

Sono toki wa kizukenakatta hanarete hajimete wakatta

Dare yori mo atatakai egao ima nara kitto kizuketa yo

Omoide o hakonde kuru kaze sore de mo kisetsu wa sugite yuku dake

Kimi no nukumori nokoru hidarite sotto poketto ni shimatte

Kaze ga chotto dake tsumetaku naru

Konna toki koso ite hoshii no ni

Kimi wa ano hi no kioku no naka

Kanashii hodo egao no mama

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Harahara to fukare mau konoha ni ano hi nokoshita kimi no kotoba o

Omoidashi hitori tasogare jojo ni usureteku kimi no omokage

Hitori tatazumu machi no zattou dandan to tomoridasu gaitou

Kimi to kasaneta te no nukumori mo toki o kasanete utsuro ni

Yonaga ni hikaru tsuki no akari oboroge na kioku no naka ni

Kimi no sugata o sagashite issho ni itakatta kono kisetsu o

Sugiteiku hibi o akashite "Genki kai" tte ima wa ieru yo

Tsumetaku natteku akikaze o kanjinagara ashita e to

Kaze ga chotto dake tsumetaku naru

Konna toki koso ite hoshii no ni

Kimi wa ano hi no kioku no naka

Kanashii hodo egao no mama

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Ima sorezore no keshiki to jikan ga sugite yuku no ni

Fuyu no ashioto chikazuku to fui ni tomaru tokei no hari

Tooku tooku hanarebanare kaze no uwasa mo todokanai kedo

Semete kimi yo ano hi no you na egao wa wasurenaide

Douka waratteite

Kaze ga sotto hakonda kaori ni kimi no omoide ga yomigaeru

Ima wa shiawase na kioku no naka mabushii hodo egao no mama

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Kaze ga chotto dake tsumetaku naru

Konna toki koso ite hoshii no ni

Kimi wa ano hi no kioku no naka

Kanashii hodo egao no mama

The wind grows just a little bit colder

It's times like these when I want you nearby the most

Yet you're only within my memory of that day

Still smiling so happily it makes me sad

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

The gingko trees along the Koshu Kaido... every time I cross that pedestrian bridge [1]

I still remember them; do you still remember too?

Laughter echoes, the scenery is blurred by tears

You were always by my side... I thought you'd always stay by my side

At the time I didn't notice; I only realized it after you were gone

Your smile was warmer than anyone's - if it had been now, I would have realized it

The wind brings memories with it, but still the seasons only pass me by

Softly I place my hand, where your warmth still lingers, in my pocket

The wind grows just a little bit colder

It's times like these when I want you nearby the most

Yet you're only within my memory of that day

Still smiling so happily it makes me sad

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

The words you left behind that day dance on the wind with the falling leaves

I recall them as I face the dusk alone, and the traces of you slowly fade

I stand alone on the bustling street as its lights start to glow one by one

The warmth my hand felt from yours grows empty with time

As the moon shines through the long night, within my hazy memories

I search for you; I wanted to spend this season with you

After all the days that have passed, if I saw you now I could ask "How are you?"

I feel the autumn breeze grow colder as I move on to tomorrow

The wind grows just a little bit colder

It's times like these when I want you nearby the most

Yet you're only within my memory of that day

Still smiling so happily it makes me sad

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Even though we're each seeing different scenery and living on separate time now

As the footsteps of winter draw closer, the hands of the clock suddenly stop

We're so far, far apart, rumors on the wind don't even reach me

But please just don't forget the way you smiled on that day

Please stay smiling

The scent carried softly on the wind brings back memories of you

Now you live only in my happiest memories, still smiling so brilliantly

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh Oh

The wind grows just a little bit colder

It's times like these when I want you nearby the most

Yet you're only within my memory of that day

Still smiling so happily it makes me sad

[1] The Koshu Kaido is a historic road, one of five built in the Edo period to connect Edo (now Tokyo) with other locations in Japan. At present it runs between Tokyo and the town of Shimosuwa in Nagano Prefecture.

Disclaimer: This song belongs to Funky Monkey Babys and Dreamusic Inc., not me. I only take credit for the romaji and translation. I'm just a fangirl trying to make J-music a little more accessible to English speakers. No copyright infringement is intended. Please don't sue me - I'm already broke. T__T

Current Mood: anxious

Current Music:Star Wars - Duel of the Fates
